title: Project Schedule Delay Due to Weather
description: A project manager must update the project schedule to account for three days of lost work due to severe weather.

tasks.description: Identify all tasks on the critical path affected by the 3-day weather delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of critical path tasks that were scheduled during the lost days is generated.

tasks.description: Update the Gantt chart by shifting the affected tasks and their dependencies forward by three days.
tasks.expected_outcome: The project schedule is correctly updated to reflect the delay.

tasks.description: Notify all project stakeholders of the revised project completion date.
tasks.expected_outcome: A notification is sent to all relevant stakeholders with the new timeline.
